name: Quantum Coffee Maker
description: Brews your coffee in multiple dimensions simultaneously.

name: Holographic Smartphone
description: Projects a 3D holographic display and interface.

name: Time-Traveling Watch
description: Keeps time in all time zones, including those not invented yet.

name: Telepathic Headphones
description: Plays music based on your mood and thoughts.

name: Invisible Tablet
description: A fully functional tablet that can become invisible.

name: AI Personal Chef
description: A robot that can cook any dish perfectly.

name: Self-Cleaning Keyboard
description: A keyboard that never gets dirty.

name: Levitating Speaker
description: A speaker that levitates and follows you around the house.

name: Smart Mirror
description: A mirror that shows your health stats and the weather.

name: Teleportation Pad
description: A device that can teleport you anywhere in the world.
